name: Mandibuzz
description: Although it’s a bit of a ruffian, this Pokémon will take lost Vullaby under its wing and care for them till they’re ready to leave the nest.

attacks.name: Bone Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Blindside
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
